posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Ty Cobb Red Portraits with the following backs...
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I am looking for the following T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait cards in graded 3-6 condition. 

  * SC 350 Fact 25
  * SC 460 Fact 42 OP
  * Pied 460 Fact 25
  * EPDG
  * OM
  * Carolina Brights


Paying strong prices. Please PM me or email me if you have any of the above for sale

thank you!
Jamie
